documents.document: Check Barb at the SAG awards. Defs not dead anymore hen, just killin it.
God it really does piss on everyone who has ever held the honour of being President of the United States eh.
@piersmorgan @arobertwebb @YouTube Haha what an irrelevant argument. Cmon Piers, that was crap even by your standards.
See if Winona upstaged me like that she'd be getting a swift kick in the shins.
@theresa_may I'm so ashamed. If you don't represent us we will make ourselves heard. Our current unrest and distrust will only get worse.
@colinfawkes I wouldn't dream of it!
Treating myself to first class at the dominion to see Trainspotting 2 cos I'm classy and fab.
It's alright everyone. Theresa saw my tweet and has said her piece and she's no having it.
Horrified that an immigrant ban has been put in place in 2017 but the fact that the PM who represents me has said f all, makes me sick.
Never off the heid of the road.
@DannySmith3 was he good? it's widely accepted that he's the second best actor in our family.
@AyDre3K it's about the right to choose.
Knew all week there was a big old cry on the way and it's just come out watching Mary Berry pick up her NTA.
Isn't it scary that the biggest threat in the world just now isn't radical terrorism, but a moronic failed businessman.
@MsAshleyDavies That was hideous.
No bloody wonder Trump supporters follow him, you should see some of the utter shite that their papers report. Talk about fake news.
People I would gladly rid the world of includes fame-hungry nobodies like Piers Morgan and Katie Hopkins. Faux-controversial is dull.
@piersmorgan @mcgregor_ewan That's not a political opinion. Your's was on women standing up for themselves when their rights are vulnerable.
@piersmorgan He doesn't need to debate, his statement by not doing the interview said it all.
@shipwrecksean fame's changed you.
@shipwrecksean this isn't true sometimes we duet.
@shipwrecksean Hang on a fucking minute are you insta-famous?
@COCOakrisps I have so many replies to this but I can't stomach the stupidity. Glad you're treated as equal to men, wherever you are.
@BetsyDeVos oh it was a staff member was it? Smells like #alternativefacts
@katsosmith you're not wrong hen. I'll just keep tweeting it until then.
@realDonaldTrump I tuned in, mostly because I wanted something to stop the whole thing. Ratings definitely don't mean popularity, Donald.
@realDonaldTrump *spot the tweet Donald didn't write himself* #alternativeopinions #faketweet #yuuugeidiot
@larbertred I will check that every damn day until it says yes.
Welcome to Lisa's word of the day. Today's word is 'impeach'.
@larbertred hahah that's exactly what I said!
Where can I make a complaint about how consistently shit @BBCiPlayer is?
I actually couldn't be prouder of girls across the world today. 💕💃🏻✌🏼🙅🏼👑💪🏼🚺#WomensMarch
I don't know what was more sickening. Norovirus or the inauguration.
Wee furball on my lap. https://t.co/qXX06gcZky
Tell you what I don't like. Living in the constant fucking fear of powerful idiots and large misled flocks.
Ideally, I'd like to never leave my bed.
@adave2remember couldn't be more right. Look at us go. https://t.co/RnKBrNeNx4
@adave2remember thanks you dream. Feeling 💪🏼💪🏼💪🏼
Last day of my C9. Feel really good but the temptation to get myself a sausage and tattie scone roll to eat at midnight is real.
I love that the people who sing me happy birthday every year do it in eight part harmony. #stagey
I LEGIT PUNCHED THE AIR WHEN IT SAID 'LISA YOU'RE GOING TO HAMILTON'. I could cry but I'm at work so I won't. SO SO EXCITED. #HamiltonLondon
@katsosmith p.s let's treat ourselves to buffet when we stop dieting. #alltheminispringrolls
I miss desperate housewives.
Genuinely pretty shaken by that. #Sherlock
@katsosmith aww I actually felt sad reading that. Well done gal, I know how hard that was. 💪🏼💪🏼💪🏼💪🏼
Such a nice night with my girls. Now so happy to be tucked up in bed ☺️☺️
Walked back to work from Leith an hour ago and I'm still trying to defrost.
If this is a rom com, kill the director.
Breaking muh heart to 'There's Always Me' from All Shook Up.
It's only when you're dieting you realise how many food related articles are on ya Facebook. 🍯🥐🍞🥖🧀🍤🥞🥓🍳🍗🍖🍕🌭🍔🥗🌮🥙🍟🥘🍜🍲🍪🍩🍿🍾🍷🍸🥂🍻👅👅👅👅👅
There's something quite nice about working away in the comfort of my own bed.
Sometimes I think about working in London and then I see the absolute nonsense like today and I think again.
Feelings on Streep aside, the president-elect denied he mocked the disabled man and people are trying to defend him. That's the problem here
@ScottPresler Because as horrible as that crime was, they aren't about to take on the most powerful job in the world.
And of course @realDonaldTrump replies like a petulant teenager with no real argument or valid point. 'I didn't do it' and 'she's shit'.
@Deplorable_Dude What if opinions differ on what the problem is?
@foxandfriends @KellyannePolls But not concerned that someone with a platform like Trump was mocking a disabled man in front of millions?
Dieting in an agency is hard work.
Starting my @OfficialForever C9 today. Feeling v determined.
@shterny1 @BillyBaldwin he does the exact same to millions of people making them feel small, helpless and unsafe.
Fun fact of the day: Felicity Jones was Ethel Hallow in the Worst Witch.
Was blown away by @lewismacdougall in A Monster Calls. It's nice when Currie High alumni aren't just on Jeremy Kyle.
My Sunday has been sponsored by the letter C. Cuddlin, cycling, cinema and curry.
@ovationtv Any chance there's going to be another series of Big Ballet?
On a scale of emotionally stability I am nowhere near strong enough to deal with a full episode of 24 hours in A&E.
Look at this pair of absolute cuties. https://t.co/tV9CuLGjsd
He's not going to sell much ice cream going at that speed is he?
Is anyone more glorious on twitter than @richardosman? I think not.
Swallowed too much pool water and now I don't feel well. #tokyo2020
Regret reading comments on Facebook and twitter because my anxiety goes through the bloody roof. How can people be so backward and bigoted.
Slathered myself in Vicks like the Victoria's Secret model that I am and now collapsed in bed.
Yasssss big fat quiz of everything.
Listen, there's stupid people everywhere. Bigots, racists, uneducated masses etc. But the sheer, dangerous volume of them in the US is scary
Happily holding my hands up as someone who will never have the legs to suit over the knee boots.
I'd like to proclaim myself as inventor of the 'Rumple' which is a charming blend of rum and apple. It's an odd concoction but it works.
Back to the grind...
Classic night before back to work. Starting a cold, can't sleep, agitated. May the fun commence...
@MumsnetTowers Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them!… https://t.co/cYZcIddltd
@The_Autism_Dad Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them!… https://t.co/TDcGToZB9n
@autismspeaks Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them!… https://t.co/u4uYfgLQ7r
@AutismSociety Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them!… https://t.co/VXKirQVEEc
@Autism Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them!… https://t.co/hBDGn7YFH2
Can anyone help? Need spare Nuby cups like these for an autistic boy who will only drink from them! #nubycup… https://t.co/WbRe3f3RVZ
@The_Zeitghost Awww Neil. Both the gesture and that Jamie got fed makes me happy ☺️
Last day of freedom so I'm gonna do as many happy things as possible.
I have my own Netflix subscription so I think you'll find I'm an independent woman.
My clean room and clean sheets are too inviting so I'm going to have to have a nap.
PYISSIN' MYSELF LAUGHING at that's the way aha aha @joelycett
Started 2017 how I mean to go on- fat, sparkly and drunk. 🕺🏻
HAPPY NEW YEARRRRR! Spent it drunk with my loved ones and you can't get better than that. #2017
@joedwalker sending love and strength. You can do this.
I am so so tired but I can't get to sleep. Annoying.
I really hate that instagram decides what I want to see in my timeline. Y'ALL DONT KNOW ME.
Pride is on iplayer for anyone who hasn't seen it and loves a good heartwarmer.
@adave2remember yes honey and it's lush. You been in LDN?
For anyone in any doubt, Dishoom is great.
@philippaulburns was either of them walesy? #quitelikely
@santanderukhelp depositing money into my account. Was told a law had changed and all nationalities were to be confirmed?
At the building society today and was asked to confirm my nationality?! Can @santanderuk explain what difference it makes?
@TuckerCarlson @edhenry @FoxNews umm, that would be you. Im sad that the irony of this is lost on you.
